name: Chancy Catacombs
description:
Navigate the randomly-generated catacombs by manipulating dice rolls in your favor. Avoid the spikes and find the gold at the end!

Assets used:

  • Godot Engine
  • https://hamzalopode.itch.io/dungeon-crawler-tileset
  • https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-dungeon-tileset
  • https://natancosta.itch.io/modicus-dungeon
  • https://cheekyinkling.itch.io/shikashis-fantasy-icons-pack
  • https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/textures
  • https://www.fontspace.com/treasure-map-font-f40513
  • https://mayragandra.itch.io/free-footsteps-sound-effects
  • Misc sounds from FreeSound.org
